landing.heroSubtitle: Welcome to MaqsadM, the platform where your goals get the power of community. Define your purpose, join forces, and grow.
landing.whySubtitle: A clean, focused, and collaborative environment designed to help you succeed.
landing.feature1Desc: Create or join groups to connect with others who share your ambitions and keep each other motivated.
landing.feature2Desc: Work together on tasks within your group, track progress, and celebrate collective achievements.
landing.feature3Desc: Earn coins for completing tasks and climb the leaderboards. Healthy competition to fuel your drive.

dashboard.welcomeSubtitle: Here's what's on your plate for today. Let's make it a productive one.

todoList.title: Your To-Do List
todoList.description: Tasks from all the groups you've joined. Keep up the great work!
todoList.allTasksCompletedSub: Great job! Time to relax or find a new challenge.

taskCompletionDialog.title: Confirm Task Completion
taskCompletionDialog.description: You are about to mark the task "{{taskTitle}}" as complete.
taskCompletionDialog.integrityDescription: By confirming, you agree that you have completed this task to the best of your ability. Honesty is key to personal growth and community trust.

groups.title: Discover Groups
groups.subtitle: Find your tribe and start achieving goals together.

createTaskDialog.title: Create New Task
createTaskDialog.description: Add a new task for your group members to complete.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: See who's leading the pack. Keep pushing forward!

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal information, goals, and habits.
profile.myGoalsDescription: What are you trying to achieve? Be specific! (e.g., Run a marathon, learn to code, read 20 books)
profile.myHabitsDescription: What are the daily/weekly habits you are building? (e.g., Meditate daily, workout 3x a week)

toast.title: Profile Updated
toast.description: Your goals and habits have been saved successfully.
